comment.author: 50851034@N00
comment._content: This photo actually originates from the New York Giants-Chicago White Sox World Tour of 1913-14. Players with "CHICAGO" on their jerseys are from the White Sox, not the University of Chicago.

comment.author: 82214664@N00
comment._content: John McGraw always reminds me of a family member on my Mom's side.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
More photos of the Chicago White Sox / New York Giants World Tour are over here. Click on this photo of the Lusitania, returning the baseball men to New York harbor:
